snippet.title: Man gunned down at NSW nightclub: court
snippet.content: A wounded father-of-two ran back inside a Wollongong nightclub with a gunman hot on his heels, a NSW jury has heard. Dragan Sekuljica was fatally shot execution-style by a balaclava-clad gunman in an alleged contract killing at Splashes nightclub in the early hours of September 8, 2007. Accused gunman Tevi Koloamatangi, 47, and accused planner Zlatan Popovic, 45, are standing trial at the NSW Supreme Court in Darlinghurst after pleading not guilty to his murder. (C) AAP 2017
